author: dkhaywood
msg: organize imports and/or explicitly implementing NakedObjectPersistorProvider (make existing getter public if required) to document dependency through class signature.

author: dkhaywood
msg: organize imports, explicitly implementing NakedObjectPersistorProvider (make existing getter public if required) to document dependency through class signature.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectPersistor now extends a number of new smaller interfaces (NakedObjectDirtier, NakedObjectResolver, NakedObjectServManager, Resettable) that correspond to each of its core responsibilities.  Note that the actual implementation is unchanged (ie not factored out the implementing classes, just structured the interface hierarchy).  For precedent, see previous extraction of responsibilities in NakedObjectSpecification.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Fixed incorrect message in disableReason for ImmutableFacetImpl.
